terms.introduction_text: Welcome to Vikitorek. These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services. By using our services, you agree to these terms.
terms.usage_rights_text: The service provides simplified Wikipedia content for educational purposes. All Wikipedia content is subject to Wikipedia's license.
terms.content_policy_text: Users may not submit inappropriate, offensive, or illegal content. We reserve the right to remove such content without notice.
terms.subscription_text: Free users are limited to 10 queries. Premium subscriptions offer unlimited queries. Subscription fees are non-refundable but can be cancelled anytime.
terms.privacy_text: We collect minimal data necessary to provide our services. See our Privacy Policy for details on how we handle your data.
terms.limitations_text: We strive for accuracy but do not guarantee the completeness or reliability of content. The service is provided 'as is' without warranties.
terms.contact_text: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@vikitorek.com.
terms.auto_renewal_text: All subscriptions automatically renew at the end of the billing cycle unless cancelled by the user before renewal. You will be charged using the payment method on file.
terms.refunds_text: All subscription fees are non-refundable unless required by law. If you experience billing errors or accidental charges, please contact support within 7 days for resolution.
terms.account_termination_text: You may cancel your account at any time. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate our Terms, including abuse of the service, non-payment, or fraudulent behavior.
terms.user_responsibilities_text: You agree not to misuse the service, attempt to reverse-engineer it, access it using automated means, or disrupt its operation. Violations may result in account suspension or legal action.
terms.modifications_text: We may update these Terms from time to time. If we make material changes, we will notify you via email or through the service. Continued use of the service indicates acceptance of the updated Terms.
terms.governing_law_text: These Terms are governed by the laws of Czechia. Any disputes arising out of or relating to these Terms shall be resolved through binding arbitration or in the courts of Czechia.
terms.service_availability_text: We strive to keep the service available at all times but do not guarantee uninterrupted access. Maintenance, updates, or technical issues may cause temporary outages. We are not liable for any losses resulting from service downtime.
terms.third_party_services_text: Our service integrates with third-party providers including Wikipedia (for content), Stripe (for payments), and Mistral AI (for language processing). Your use of these features is also subject to the respective terms and privacy policies of those services.
